files.name: NavigationMenu.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import {
  NavigationMenuRoot,
  type NavigationMenuRootEmits,
  type NavigationMenuRootProps,
  useForwardPropsEmits,
} from 'reka-ui';
import NavigationMenuViewport from './NavigationMenuViewport.vue';

const props = defineProps<NavigationMenuRootProps>();
const emits = defineEmits<NavigationMenuRootEmits>();

const forwarded = useForwardPropsEmits(props, emits);
</script>

<template>
  <NavigationMenuRoot
    v-bind="forwarded"
    class="sigma-ui-navigation-menu"
  >
    <slot />
    <NavigationMenuViewport />
  </NavigationMenuRoot>
</template>

<style>
.sigma-ui-navigation-menu {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 10;
  display: flex;
  max-width: max-content;
  flex: 1;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}
</style>

files.name: NavigationMenuContent.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import {
  NavigationMenuContent,
  type NavigationMenuContentEmits,
  type NavigationMenuContentProps,
  useForwardPropsEmits,
} from 'reka-ui';

const props = defineProps<NavigationMenuContentProps>();
const emits = defineEmits<NavigationMenuContentEmits>();

const forwarded = useForwardPropsEmits(props, emits);
</script>

<template>
  <NavigationMenuContent
    v-bind="forwarded"
    class="sigma-ui-navigation-menu-content"
  >
    <slot />
  </NavigationMenuContent>
</template>

<style>
.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-content {
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-content[data-state^="open"] {
  animation: fade-in 200ms ease-in-out;
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-content[data-state^="closed"] {
  animation: fade-out 200ms ease-in-out;
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-content[data-motion="from-end"] {
  animation: slide-in-from-right 200ms ease-in-out;
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-content[data-motion="from-start"] {
  animation: slide-in-from-left 200ms ease-in-out;
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-content[data-motion="to-end"] {
  animation: slide-out-to-right 200ms ease-in-out;
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-content[data-motion="to-start"] {
  animation: slide-out-to-left 200ms ease-in-out;
}

@media (width >= 768px) {
  .sigma-ui-navigation-menu-content {
    position: absolute;
    width: auto;
  }
}

@keyframes fade-in {
  from {
    filter: blur(12px);
    opacity: 0;
  }

  to {
    filter: blur(0);
    opacity: 1;
  }
}

@keyframes fade-out {
  from {
    opacity: 1;
  }

  to {
    opacity: 0;
  }
}

@keyframes slide-in-from-right {
  from {
    filter: blur(12px);
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(13rem);
  }

  to {
    filter: blur(0);
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slide-in-from-left {
  from {
    filter: blur(12px);
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(-13rem);
  }

  to {
    filter: blur(0);
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slide-out-to-right {
  from {
    filter: blur(0);
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }

  to {
    filter: blur(12px);
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(13rem);
  }
}

@keyframes slide-out-to-left {
  from {
    filter: blur(0);
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }

  to {
    filter: blur(12px);
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(-13rem);
  }
}
</style>

files.name: NavigationMenuIndicator.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { NavigationMenuIndicator, type NavigationMenuIndicatorProps, useForwardProps } from 'reka-ui';

const props = defineProps<NavigationMenuIndicatorProps>();

const forwardedProps = useForwardProps(props);
</script>

<template>
  <NavigationMenuIndicator
    v-bind="forwardedProps"
    class="sigma-ui-navigation-menu-indicator"
  >
    <div class="sigma-ui-navigation-menu-indicator__pointer" />
  </NavigationMenuIndicator>
</template>

<style>
.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-indicator {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
  top: 100%;
  display: flex;
  overflow: hidden;
  height: 0.375rem;
  align-items: flex-end;
  justify-content: center;
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-indicator[data-state="visible"] {
  animation: navigation-menu-indicator-in 0.2s ease;
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-indicator[data-state="hidden"] {
  animation: navigation-menu-indicator-out 0.2s ease;
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-indicator__pointer {
  position: relative;
  top: 60%;
  width: 0.5rem;
  height: 0.5rem;
  background-color: hsl(var(--border));
  border-top-left-radius: 0.125rem;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 6px -1px rgb(0 0 0 / 10%);
  transform: rotate(45deg);
}

@keyframes navigation-menu-indicator-in {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
  }

  to {
    opacity: 1;
  }
}

@keyframes navigation-menu-indicator-out {
  from {
    opacity: 1;
  }

  to {
    opacity: 0;
  }
}
</style>

files.name: NavigationMenuList.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { NavigationMenuList, type NavigationMenuListProps, useForwardProps } from 'reka-ui';

const props = defineProps<NavigationMenuListProps>();

const forwardedProps = useForwardProps(props);
</script>

<template>
  <NavigationMenuList
    v-bind="forwardedProps"
    class="sigma-ui-navigation-menu-list"
  >
    <slot />
  </NavigationMenuList>
</template>

<style>
.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-list {
  display: flex;

  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0.25rem;

files.name: NavigationMenuTrigger.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import {
  NavigationMenuTrigger,
  type NavigationMenuTriggerProps,
  useForwardProps,
} from 'reka-ui';
import { ChevronDownIcon } from 'lucide-vue-next';
import { navigationMenuTriggerStyle } from '.';

const props = defineProps<NavigationMenuTriggerProps>();

const forwardedProps = useForwardProps(props);
</script>

<template>
  <NavigationMenuTrigger
    v-bind="forwardedProps"
    class="sigma-ui-navigation-menu-trigger"
    :class="[navigationMenuTriggerStyle()]"
  >
    <slot />
    <ChevronDownIcon
      class="sigma-ui-navigation-menu-trigger__icon"
      aria-hidden="true"
    />
  </NavigationMenuTrigger>
</template>

<style>
.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-trigger {
  position: relative;
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-trigger__base {
  display: inline-flex;
  width: max-content;
  height: 2.5rem;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
  border-radius: var(--radius);
  background-color: hsl(var(--background));
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition-duration: 150ms;
  transition-property: color, background-color;
  transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-trigger__base:hover {
  background-color: hsl(var(--secondary));
  color: hsl(var(--secondary-foreground));
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-trigger__base:focus {
  background-color: hsl(var(--secondary));
  color: hsl(var(--secondary-foreground));
  outline: none;
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-trigger__base:disabled {
  opacity: 0.5;
  pointer-events: none;
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-trigger__base[data-active] {
  background-color: hsl(var(--secondary) / 50%);
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-trigger__base[data-state="open"] {
  background-color: hsl(var(--secondary) / 50%);
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-trigger__icon {
  position: relative;
  top: 1px;
  width: 0.75rem;
  height: 0.75rem;
  margin-left: 0.25rem;
  transition: transform 0.2s;
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-trigger__icon[data-state="open"] {
  transform: rotate(180deg);
}
</style>
